A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A visually impressive film which lacks heart and borderlines on abusive towards the pre-established characters and story lines (From both the original trilogy and the force awakens) Most of what JJ Abrams tried to do in the force awakens is discarded in this film for no more reason than to appear contrarian. The plot is plodding and too many irrelevant side stories which serve only to occupy characters who have nothing better to do.
